caption.title: Same as for Fig 3 but predictions showing the best model for MERS-CoV incidence in each of the three regions.
caption.p: Notice that whereas M1 provides the best prediction for both Macca and Madina (top), M2 instead does it for the two-strain situation occurring in Riyadh. Blue line is MERS-CoV cases, solid black line predictions and yellow area denotes 95% confidence interval for predictions.
